name: Susan Slover
biography:
Designer, founding partner and creative director, Slover and Company design firm, New York.
Born Tampa, Florida.
B.F.A., Auburn University, Alabama.
Assistant art director, Neiman Marcus, Dallas, Texas.Held positions in several firms and agencies in San Francisco and Atlanta.
1979  Relocated to New York. Created the original catalog for the Rockefeller Collection at Kykuit.
1984  Opened her own design firm, Slover and Company. Clients include retail, interior design and fashion apparel companies. Assignments encompass environmental design and corporate and brand identity.

Source: Personal communication, office of Slover and Company, October 31, 2001.
